note.p: Portrait painter and photographer. Son of Benjamin Rawlinson Faulkner, portrait painter (ODNB). In Bath, 1851. Married Sarah Brown at Christchurch, St Marylebone, in 1852. Portrait painter in Marylebone, 1861; in Kensington, 1871. Of 46 Kensington Gardens Square, 1864–77, then at 21 Baker Street, Portman Square. Artist and photographer in Marylebone, 1881.
Census returns of England and Wales 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/675/14/25/42), 1851 (HO107/1943/164/28), 1861 (RG9/89/40/5), 1871 (RG10/31/27/47), 1881 (RG11/163/79/1)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 3 June 2020)
London, England, Church of England marriages and banns, 1754–1932 (Ancestry.com, accessed 3 June 2020)
Registers of births, marriages and deaths surrendered to the non-parochial registers commissions of 1837 and 1857 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG4/4269)
